overview: Prepare for a wild ride as the most talented snowmobile riders in the world perform a range of ridiculously difficult tricks and stunts. Your heart will be racing as you see monster backflips, painful wipeouts, killer cliff dives and huge air. A collection of the most stunning snowmobile clips ever recorded, this program is sure to please extreme sports fans and thrill seekers with its dangerous stunts and nonstop action.
title: Slednecks: Best of Extreme Snowmobiles
